New Records: Sadio Mane scored his 44th goal for Senegal, moving him higher in the all-time scoring charts.
Key Match Events: Burundi secured a thrilling five-goal encounter against Malawi, while Senegal suffered a late heartbreak against Burkina Faso.
Pre-Game Insights: Senegal is expected to resume normal service after a subpar performance against Burkina Faso, while Burundi is on a positive note after consecutive wins.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is significant for both teams as it contributes to their Africa Cup of Nations qualifying efforts.
